lines.text: Ephraim, what are you staring at?
Oh stop it. They're tourists, just like us.
Stop your nonsense. Take your book out and read. Really.
Ladies and gentleman, this is your new captain speaking again. For your information, in thirty minutes we will be landing.

[when offered to drink some champagne]
Thank you. But I have my own label.
This plane now is under our control. It will answer to the name of "Haifa". And only to that name.
How dare he call the plane "Haifa"?
